sentences.en: A French-based pharmaceuticals company ran into cash-flow problems and faced liquidation.
sentences.cn: 法国的一家制药公司陷入资金周转问题，面临清算的危机。

sentences.en: Article 34 Time limit of administrative liquidation is 12 months.
sentences.cn: 第三十四条行政清理期限一般不超过12个月.

sentences.en: Assets are recorded at cost, and not at liquidation prices.
sentences.cn: 资产以花费来计, 而不是按清算来计.

sentences.en: Chapter three strengthens creditor interest protection and perfects corporation liquidation legislation.
sentences.cn: 第三章加强债权人利益保护,完善公司清算立法.

sentences.en: Exchanges responsible for the payment clearing liquidation. Tracking and management.
sentences.cn: 负责往来款项结算清算. 追踪及管理.

sentences.en: He had taken over an old company verging on liquidation.
sentences.cn: 他接办了一家行将破产的老公司.

sentences.en: He lost all he possessed when his company was put into liquidation.
sentences.cn: 当公司被清算结业时他失去了拥有的一切.

sentences.en: Here we introduce to common liquidation procedures for non - bankruptcy liquidation.
sentences.cn: 这里先介绍 非 破产清算的普通清算程序.

sentences.en: Hundreds of small businesses went into liquidation (= were closed ).
sentences.cn: 数以百计的小公司破产了。

sentences.en: Our company is just a short step away from going into liquidation.
sentences.cn: 我们公司离停业只有一步之遥了.

sentences.en: The bankrupt company went into liquidation.
sentences.cn: 这家破产公司停业清盘.

sentences.en: The company collapsed and went into liquidation because of bad management.
sentences.cn: 该公司因经营不善而倒闭清盘.

sentences.en: The company has gone into liquidation .
The directors of the company had issued orders for liquidation of the Burma venture.
sentences.cn: 公司董事会就发出命令,结束在缅甸的冒险.

sentences.en: The law stipulates modes for company merger, dismantlement, bankruptcy, dissolution and liquidation.
sentences.cn: 该法规定了公司合并 、 分立 、 破产 、 解散和清算的方式.

words.tran_cn: 液体的；清澈的；明亮的；易变的
清算人；公司资产清理人
流动性；流动资产；[金融] 偿债能力
榨汁机；食物液化器（等于blender）

trans.tran_en: the act of closing a company by selling the things that belong to it, in order to pay its debts
